snippet: In the second diplomacy-tinged sea rescue in less than a week, a vessel on patrol near the Persian Gulf pulled a group of distressed Iranians to safety from a foundering cargo dhow.
abstract: United States Navy saves a group of distressed Iranian mariners whose vessel was stranded and flooding in the Persian Gulf; action is second sea rescue in less than two weeks to play out against a background of diplomatic conflict between Iran and the United States.
lead_paragraph: In the second diplomacy-tinged sea rescue in less than a week, a vessel on patrol near the Persian Gulf pulled a group of distressed Iranians to safety from a foundering cargo dhow.

headline.seo: Iranian Sailors Rescued by Coast Guard
headline.main: U.S. Navy Reports Second Rescue of Iranian Mariners
headline.print_headline: U.S. Navy Reports Second Rescue of Iranian Mariners in a Week
